name: Lunar Escape (Delpire)
description:
Lunar Escape

Entry for the Godot Wild Jam #48! An arcade style driving game where you must collect rocket parts to build your rocket and escape the moon. Collect rare metals to upgrade your lunar rover.

Controls
  • Drive - WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Upgrades - E (in base area)
  • Respawn - P
Godot Wild Jam #48
